## ciliumctl endpoint config

View & modify endpoint configuration

```
ciliumctl endpoint config <endpoint id> [<option>=(enable|disable) ...] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
endpoint config 5421 DropNotification=false TraceNotification=false PolicyVerdictNotification=true
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for config
      --list-options    List available options
  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ciliumctl endpoint](ciliumctl_endpoint.md)	 - Manage endpoints
